problem_text_cn: 如图,已知直线l_{1},l_{2},l_{3}分别交直线l4于点A,B,C,交直线l5于点D,E,F,且l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},若AB=4,AC=6,DF=9,则DE=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that straight lines l_{1},l_{2},l_{3}intersect straight lines l4 at points A, B, and C respectively, and intersecting straight lines lN_1 at points D, E, F, and l_ 1 ∥ l_ 2 ∥ l_ 3, if AB=N_0,AC=N_1,DF=N_2, then DE = ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行线分线段成比例定理的应用,能熟练地运用定理进行计算是解此题的关键,题目比较典型,难度适中,注意:对应成比例．
